item.title: Windows Efficient Setup
item.description: Last month I read DHH’s blog post Introducing Omakub. Omakub is a project that helps you to setup your Ubuntu machine by running a single command. DHH composed a list of tools he uses on his Ubuntu. In spirit of the post, I decided to setup my Windows machine efficiently like Omakub. You can find the full setup script here. Following is the keyboard Layout I am using. Keyboard Layout Tool: AutoHotKey, PowerToys
